mapper.select:
SELECT /* operSupport.getIndexCode 지수구분코드를 조회한다. */
tm_index_code.large_code AS large_code /* 대 */ , tm_index_code.middle_code AS middle_code /* 중 */ , tm_index_code.small_code AS small_code /* 소 */ , tm_index_code.index_name AS index_name /* 지수명 */
FROM tm_index_code WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY tm_index_code.large_code , tm_index_code.middle_code , tm_index_code.small_code

SELECT /* operSupport.getOperCode 운용사 코드를 조회한다. */
tm_user_domain.type_cd AS type_cd /* 사용자 타입코드 */ , tm_user_domain.inst_cd AS inst_cd /* 기관구분코드 */ , tm_user_domain.inst_name AS inst_name /* 기관명 */ , tm_user_domain.krx_cd AS krx_cd /* 거래소ETP발행사코드 */
FROM tm_user_domain WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY tm_user_domain.inst_cd
